desc: Probable 25% dmg cut, 30% boost to Def, slight elemental dmg boost & boosts BB gauge, HP each turn

dictionary.lore: Legend has it there was once a Ten-Winged Tormentor who was destroyed by five brave warriors after it had caused mass destruction. During their final battle, each of the five warriors' attacks exhibited a light of different color that combined with the rest, leaving behind a single locus of five different hues. The origins of a painting depicting this locus made of colors that refused to merge together is unknown, but it is said that to this day whoever looks upon it is filled with courage.

name: Penta-Locus
